message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your business. Given its value to you, I propose a price of $13,500. This offer takes into account the significant worth of the product to you while aiming to achieve a fair profit for us. I look forward to your consideration.

Thank you for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate your understanding of the product's value to me. However,  $13,500 is still a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying at this time. I'm willing to offer $12,000 for the product.  This price reflects the value I place on the product and allows for a reasonable profit margin for you. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

Thank you for your prompt response, Bob. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. In light of your offer, I am proposing a counteroffer of $12,500 for the product. This price aims to strike a balance between your budget and our desired profit margin. I hope this proposal aligns better with your expectations and allows us to reach a mutually beneficial agreement.
